title: BetaDelta Analytics & Research
text:
Investment Product & Performance Expertise
I provide investment teams with the additional margin they need so that they can focus their energy developing relationships, building strategy, and influencing decisions.



Bandwidth you need for the important stuff
Hire me to fill talent gaps, perform manager research, join an advanced analytics team, or develop business intelligence dashboards that can help you monitor your business environment.
 

Expertise when you need it.

Hire tenured experience with investment product & performance expertise.
Over 15 years working with quantitiative data.
Understanding of multiple asset classes, investment vehicle types, investment firms, industry trends, fee arrangements, category ranings, MPT stats, asset flows, etc.
Deep familiarity with Morningstar Direct, eVestment, Strategic Insight’s SIMFUND, etc.
Data modeling and predictive analytics (Python, R, postgreSQL).
Disciplined work-ethic.
Down to earth communicator with inclusive, systematic problem solving skills.



I’d love to join your mission.

Call me. Relationships matter. If it doesn’t work out now, it still might in the near future. Please use my Calendly scheduler to do so, but if you’d rather leave a note with your details please don’t overlook the link that allows you to do that.
Talk with your team and colleagues to get alignment. Discuss how extra help will contribute to everyone’s success.
I can plug-in with your team part-time, asynchronously. High quality, part-time work is what I can offer.

title: Your Team
text:
I am an analytics professional with an investments, finance, & market research background. I am also a U.S. Marine Corps Veteran. My family and I call Franklin, Tennessee home (just south of Nashville). I have 12 years of experience at a premier, global investment manager T. Rowe Price and currently work full-time for Ramsey Solutions as a data analyst in the digital marketing and real estate business analytics space.

title: Our Mission
text:

We provide simple, aesthetic, easy-to-understand data visualizations that empower leaders to engage, influence, and grow their tribe.

We deliver world-class investment manager research & performance measurement to financial organizations who need additional support.

title: Get bandwidth
text:
Get help with business intelligence and communicating with data visualization.

Bandwidth so you can focus on the important stuff.
We can help you develop visuals, business intelligence dashboards, or reporting to help you monitor your business environment.


Hire us.

Tell us what you’re looking for.
Onboard us with your team or securely collaborate through Google Drive, Microsoft Teams, or Github.
Work with us part-time, asynchronously.

We help business leaders, expanding teams, entrepreneurs, small business owners, marketers, copywriters, graphic designers, investment advisors, non-profit executives, public administrators, insurance professionals, researchers, influencers, etc.
Create the bandwidth you need!
 

Don’t waste hours teaching yourself how to deliver effective data visualizations.
Position yourself among the professionals in your sphere.
You don’t need deep pockets.


Understand your business.


Form your data story.


Influence stakeholders.


Be understood.


Build credibility.


One chart at a time.



Chart better. Lead better.

text:
Data & Analytics Specialties

Partnering with clients to understand requirements and deliver great products.
Creating data visualizations that are fit-for-purpose, easy to integrate, & easy to socialize.
Building charts and tables you can actually understand.

Organizing data and reporting using Microsoft Excel.

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.
text:
One chart at a time
In a world flooded with text, distracted readers get bored and their attention drifts toward the simple, beautiful, and intriguing. You can keep them focused on your message by including the right visuals in the right way at the right time. Whether it be a single chart or an interactive dashboard, good presentation of your data story can make or break your leadership credibility. We can help you chart the right path forward.

title: Chart Better. Lead Better.
text:
Creating visuals & business intelligence.
Business is dynamic. Even when it’s stable, it can be hard to pin down. Things are always changing. It’s hard to get a handle on your own business operations and understand the competitive landscape.
How can you build a good picture of what’s going on, let alone find the time to do it?
Do you have the bandwidth you need to remain a dependable leader?
Are you maintaining the right level of influence when you communicate with clients or key stakeholders?
You can’t just send emails. Good presentation of your data story can make or break your leadership credibility. We can help you chart the right path forward by providing simple visualizations that fit your narrative. We also develop business intelligence dashboards that help you monitor your business environment.

And the chart will go here.

title: Welcome To The Blog
text:
This is the first post of the BetaDelta blog. Welcome!
We hope you find some great resources and insight here.
Basically, this is what my desk looks like (minus the window and cinderblock wall). I always have coffee.
Have fun exploring the blog content! Please reach out if we can help. We’re here for you!


Back to Blog

title: $10 per Day
text:
Could you save $10 a day?

Back to Blog


What habit could you change to save $10 a day?


The power of compounding
The power of compounding is immense! If you would save $10 a day and invest it at the end of each month for 40 years, and if that investment would grow at 7% annually, this is what how much wealth you would build.



financial coaching
Working with a financial coach can help you change your spending habits so that you can turn this into a reality. It’s not impossible!










Can you find investments that return 7% per year?
Some people question whether or not you can find investments that yield 7% a year. When it comes to investments, there are no guarantees, but here’s what the S&P 500 returned over 40-year rolling periods. 7% annualized returns over 40-year periods are not uncommon.

title: Pay Cash for Your New Car
text:
Don’t finance your new Camaro.

Back to Blog


Need to buy a car?


Don’t finance it.
These two charts show the difference between financing and paying cash for a new car. In this case, we’re visualizing specifics related to purchasing a new 2022 Chevy Camaro, but the concept is the same. It’s much cheaper to pay cash. If you finance, you lock up a lot of cash flow for a long time and pay a lot more for a depreciating asset you’ll have to replace anyway. Always pay cash!
This chart is better visualized on Tableau Public in full-screen mode on a desktop computer.

title: Kill College Credit Cards
text:
College credit cards are useless.

Back to Blog


Do you have a college-related credit card?


Get rid of it.
We are currently exploring the data made available through the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau of the United States government.
This is the first of several explorations in the works, but it tries to reveal the millions of dollars credit card issuers are paying academic institutions to market debt products to recent graduates and alumni.
Here’s what we found!
This chart is better visualized on Tableau Public in full-screen mode on a desktop computer.






Here is the link to the .csv file we sourced.
